mapper.insert: INSERT INTO address(us_idx, ad_name, ad_postal_code, ad_addr, ad_addr_detail, ad_tel, ad_default) VALUES (#{us_idx}, #{ad_name}, #{ad_postal_code}, #{ad_addr}, #{ad_addr_detail}, #{ad_tel}, #{ad_default});
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM address WHERE us_idx = #{us_idx} AND ad_default = 1;
mapper.update: UPDATE address SET ad_name = #{ad_name}, ad_postal_code = #{ad_postal_code}, ad_addr = #{ad_addr}, ad_addr_detail = #{ad_addr_detail}, ad_tel = #{ad_tel} WHERE ad_idx = #{ad_idx};
UPDATE address SET ad_default = 0 WHERE ad_default = 1 AND us_idx = #{us_idx} UPDATE address SET ad_default = 1 WHERE ad_idx = #{ad_idx}
